long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗦𝗮𝘃𝗲𝘀 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺 𝟰𝟬% 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗲𝗲𝗱𝗯𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗳𝗶𝘅𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀.

𝗕𝗹𝗼𝘁𝗨𝗽 makes teamwork on live websites easy and fast. It helps developers, designers, and testers fix issues, share feedback, and collaborate in real time—all in one place.

What 𝗕𝗹𝗼𝘁𝗨𝗽 Can Do:
- 𝗠𝗮𝗿𝗸 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗗𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗹𝘆: Highlight text, click on buttons, or mark sections of a webpage to leave comments.
- 𝗘𝗱𝗶𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗲: Instantly edit text and website elements while discussing changes with your team.
- 𝗦𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗜𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Let AI find problems like SEO errors or broken links automatically.
- 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗧𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀: Works with Jira, Trello, Slack, and GitHub to keep tasks organized.
- 𝗞𝗲𝗲𝗽 𝗙𝗲𝗲𝗱𝗯𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗢𝗿𝗴𝗮𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱: Threaded comments, screenshots, and logs ensure nothing is missed.
- 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗮𝗰𝘆 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀: We do not track your personal data.

𝗕𝗹𝗼𝘁𝗨𝗽 simplifies teamwork so you can solve problems faster and keep your projects on track.
Install now to see the difference!
